attributes.action: Present for public viewing any and all documentation regarding the ownership of the Shetland Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to make open for public viewing any and all documentation regarding the ownership of Shetland Islands, the origianl pawning, the rights of Shetlanders over their own lands and the rights, if any, of the British "Owners" (Scottish and English Crown and Government) on any claimed Crown Estates, taxes or oil profits.
